description: Mahamat Djouma is one of the millions displaced by the civil war in Sudan. He is part of an especially vulnerable group — unaccompanied minors. Here is his story.
title: He's 14. He loves soccer. He's the sole caregiver for his little twin brothers

description: President-elect Donald Trump taps RFK Jr. to run the Department of Health and Human Services. Here's why experts are worried. And, how the U.S. bond market could upend Trump's economic plans.
title: RFK Jr. tapped to run HHS. And, the bond market's impact on Trump's economic plans

description: There's a police check to exit the subway, another to get in line, a third while standing in line, and metal detectors and X-ray machines before you finally reach the Beijing landmark.
title: At Tiananmen Square, tight security with metal detectors reflects a changing China

description: Protect your loved ones from foodborne illnesses with this refresher course on food safety. Experts offer guidance on how long to leave food out, when to toss leftovers and more.
title: Don't give your family food poisoning this holiday season. Follow this illustrated guide

description: Trump is the latest president to appoint a czar to deal with a particular issue — in this case, the border. But what does that mean? A look at the controversial history of government czars.
title: One thing Trump and Obama have in common: a fondness for 'czars'

description: Despite outspending Republicans, Democrats didn't achieve some ambitious goals in state legislative races. The GOP continues to control more legislatures, though Democrats notched some victories.
title: Outspent 4-to-1, Republicans still made gains in state legislative elections

description: Steve Inskeep speaks with Senator Chris Murphy about how the democratic party rebuilds after its election loss.
title: Sen. Chris Murphy: Democrats need to listen to working and poor people

description: The selection of Fox News host Pete Hegseth to lead the Trump Defense Department has renewed scrutiny of his political and religious views and his aggressive criticism of the military he would be leading.
title: What's behind defense secretary pick Hegseth's war on 'woke'

description: Miners are believed to be suffering from a lack of food, water and other basic necessities after police closed off the entrances used to transport supplies.
title: South Africa's government won't help the illegal miners inside a closed mine

description: Violence has exploded in Port-au-Prince since Sunday when the Haiti's interim prime minister was fired amid political infighting.
title: Masses of residents flee homes in Haiti's capital as gangs ratchet up violence
